summary: Mobile developer mainly focused on Apple iOS devices. He has a solid theoretical and practical knowledge of the Swift language and several frameworks such as UIKit, SpriteKit, ARKit, CoreGraphics, CoreImage and many more. He is constantly studying and learning new technologies.

workExperience.name: PROTECO
workExperience.description: Prepared and instructed iOS development courses using the Swift language. Helped with instructing Android development courses using the Java and Kotlin programming languages. Also served a minor role with helping with Arduino, C# and Relational Database courses.

workExperience.name: Coordinación de Titulación
workExperience.description: Helped with updating and maintenance of the website of the dependency using web technologies such as HTML5, CSS3 and Bootstrap 4.

workExperience.name: Globant
workExperience.description: Analysis, design, implementation and maintenance of software modules using Swift and Objective-C.
